title: Clear noon, moderate-speed city driving with frequent braking.
caption: A blue car drives down a city street with tall buildings on either side, passing a white van and a parked truck.

The driver needs to be cautious and maintain a safe distance from the vehicles ahead to avoid any potential collisions.
